_header: Be ye an lover think ye not ye should

Banna.First Lines:
Be ȝe ane luvar Think ȝe nocht ȝe suldBe weill
                    adwysit in ȝour gouerning…
Banna.Last Lines:
…be of ȝour lufe nor prechour as a freirbe secreit trew
                    incressing of ȝour name
